summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida to an unnamed recipient, notifying them that Jeffrey Epstein has been granted participation in the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office work release program. The letter expresses regret that the office was not informed of Epstein's application and only learned of his release over six weeks after it began.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Inmate / Participant in work release program
persons.context: The subject of the letter; has applied for and been granted participation in the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office work release program, working for The Florida Science Foundation.

persons.name: R. Alexander Acosta
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, representing the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida, which is providing notification about Epstein's work release status.

events.title: Notification of Epstein's Work Release
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends a letter notifying an unnamed recipient that Jeffrey Epstein has been granted participation in the PBSO work release program and has already been participating for over six weeks.

events.title: Epstein Begins Work Release
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein begins participating in the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office work release program, working for The Florida Science Foundation, returning to the Palm Beach County Stockade each day under electronic monitoring.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was granted participation in the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office work release program.
Epstein was reportedly working for The Florida Science Foundation while on work release.
While outside the Stockade, Epstein was electronically monitored via a GPS system and an ankle bracelet.
The U.S. Attorney's Office was not notified of Epstein's application for work release and only learned of his participation over six weeks after it began.
The letter is signed by R. Alexander Acosta, then United States Attorney for the Southern District of Florida.
